title: How old do you have to be to go to a Billie Eilish concert? - Quora

response.answer_text: It all depends on the age restrictions either imposed by the promoter (who pays for and benefits from the concert), and the venue its held in, some are all ages, and some are all ages but under 16's must be accompanied by an adult, (18 in the UK, over 21 in the USA)
I 've never heard there were age limits or age restrictions. All you really have to be is extremely stupid.
